column4: maybe anyone got a quick hint for me. I want to uninstall firefox, which actually works fine, but it will be downloaded again with the next update through update manager. how can I remove it from the update process completely?
fx is part of ubuntu-desktop metapackage, not sure it's a wise idea to remove.  Good luck.
got no problems after removing it, well.. till it shows up again with the next update that is :)
right - it's more or less built into Ubuntu
